message: Hi I'm working on this app, with the ai chat a central part can you send me a message of around 500 characters so I can test how we receive it?
So what things will ai whisperer help with?
FLUSH MESSAGE - THIS SHOULD NOT BE NEEDED
Are you not Alice the assistant?
ANOTHER FLUSH - CHECKING IF BUG PERSISTS
Can you remind me who you are and what system you're part of?
Second message - does this appear without flush?
